original_text: If a son shall ask bread of any of you that is a father, will he give him a stone? or if he ask a fish, will he for a fish give him a serpent?
korean_text: 너희 중에 아버지 된 자로서 누가 아들이 생선을 달라 하는데 생선 대신에 뱀을 주며

sentences.original_text: If a son shall ask bread
of any of you that is a father
will he give him a stone?
or if he ask a fish
will he for a fish give him a serpent?
